articles.title: Texas Gov.'s truck inspection policy led to $240 million in lost produce - Business Insider
articles.description: Millions of dollars of fruits and vegetables were spoiled due to the delays, the president of the Fresh Produce Association of the Americas said.
articles.content: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott's decision to ramp up inspections of commercial trucks at the border created a logjam of trucks that resulted in hundreds of millions of lost dollars from spoiled produce and s… [+2040 chars]
